Title: generateRandomStructure
Description: Generates random table structure in a format column1_name column1_type, column2_name column2_type, ....

number_of_columns — The desired number of columns in the result table structure. If set to 0 or Null, the number of columns will be random from 1 to 128. Default value: Null.seed - Random seed to produce stable results. If seed is not specified or set to Null, it is randomly generated.
